name: concurrentfetcher
description: A javascript class for managing concurrent fetch requests.

scripts.build: rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format amd --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.amd.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format cjs --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.common.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format es --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.es.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format iife --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.iife.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format umd --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.umd.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format system --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.system.js
scripts.postbuild: node_modules/.bin/google-closure-compiler --emit_use_strict --js dist/concurrentfetcher.amd.js --create_source_map dist/concurrentfetcher.amd.min.js.map --js_output_file dist/concurrentfetcher.amd.min.js && node_modules/.bin/google-closure-compiler --emit_use_strict --js dist/concurrentfetcher.common.js --create_source_map dist/concurrentfetcher.common.min.js.map --js_output_file dist/concurrentfetcher.common.min.js && node_modules/.bin/google-closure-compiler --emit_use_strict --js dist/concurrentfetcher.es.js --create_source_map dist/concurrentfetcher.es.min.js.map --js_output_file dist/concurrentfetcher.es.min.js && node_modules/.bin/google-closure-compiler --emit_use_strict --js dist/concurrentfetcher.iife.js --create_source_map dist/concurrentfetcher.iife.min.js.map --js_output_file dist/concurrentfetcher.iife.min.js && node_modules/.bin/google-closure-compiler --emit_use_strict --js dist/concurrentfetcher.umd.js --create_source_map dist/concurrentfetcher.umd.min.js.map --js_output_file dist/concurrentfetcher.umd.min.js && node_modules/.bin/google-closure-compiler --emit_use_strict --js dist/concurrentfetcher.system.js --create_source_map dist/concurrentfetcher.system.min.js.map --js_output_file dist/concurrentfetcher.system.min.js
